00036   // Bit masks for all pkt types
00037   namespace protected_PSP {
00038     static const int32_t CONTROL_CE_BIT  = 0x80000000; // Bit 31
00039     static const int32_t CONTROL_IE_BIT  = 0x40000000; // Bit 30
00040     static const int32_t CONTROL_CR_BIT  = 0x20000000; // Bit 29
00041     static const int32_t CONTROL_IR_BIT  = 0x10000000; // Bit 28
00042     static const int32_t CONTROL_P_BIT   = 0x08000000; // Bit 27
00043     static const int32_t CONTROL_W_BIT   = 0x04000000; // Bit 26
00044     static const int32_t CONTROL_E_BIT   = 0x02000000; // Bit 25
00045     static const int32_t CONTROL_A1_BIT  = 0x01000000; // Bit 24
00046     static const int32_t CONTROL_A0_BIT  = 0x00800000; // Bit 23
00047     static const int32_t CONTROL_NK_BIT  = 0x00400000; // Bit 22
00048     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_21 = 0x00200000; // Bit 21
00049     static const int32_t CTRLACK_V_BIT   = 0x00100000; // Bit 20
00050     static const int32_t CTRLACK_X_BIT   = 0x00080000; // Bit 19
00051     static const int32_t CTRLACK_S_BIT   = 0x00040000; // Bit 18
00052     static const int32_t CTRLACK_W_BIT   = 0x00020000; // Bit 17
00053     static const int32_t CTRLACK_E_BIT   = 0x00010000; // Bit 16
00054     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_15 = 0x00008000; // Bit 15
00055     static const int32_t CTRLACK_T2_BIT  = 0x00004000; // Bit 14
00056     static const int32_t CTRLACK_T1_BIT  = 0x00002000; // Bit 13
00057     static const int32_t CTRLACK_T0_BIT  = 0x00001000; // Bit 12
00058     static const int32_t ACK_P_BIT       = 0x00000800; // Bit 11
00059     static const int32_t ACK_SX_BIT      = 0x00000400; // Bit 10
00060     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_9  = 0x00000200; // Bit 9
00061     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_8  = 0x00000100; // Bit 8
00062     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_7  = 0x00000080; // Bit 7
00063     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_6  = 0x00000040; // Bit 6
00064     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_5  = 0x00000020; // Bit 5
00065     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_4  = 0x00000010; // Bit 4
00066     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_3  = 0x00000008; // Bit 3
00067     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_2  = 0x00000004; // Bit 2
00068     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_1  = 0x00000002; // Bit 1
00069     static const int32_t PSP_RESERVED_0  = 0x00000001; // Bit 0
00070   } END_NAMESPACE // protected_PSP namespace
00071   using namespace protected_PSP;

00163     public: virtual inline void setPacketType (PacketType t) {
00164       if (t != PacketType_Command) {
00165         throw VRTException("Can not change packet type to non-Command type when using BasicCommandPacket");
00166       }
00167       BasicVRTPacket::setPacketType(t);
00168     }

00260     public: void setRequestValidationAcknowledge (bool set);
00261     //Acknowledge-V
00262     public: bool isValidationAcknowledge () const {
00263       return getRequestValidationAcknowledge();
00264     }
00265 
00271     public: void setValidationAcknowledge (bool set=true) {
00272       setRequestExecutionAcknowledge(!set);
00273       setRequestValidationAcknowledge(set);
00274     }

00277     public: bool getRequestExecutionAcknowledge () const;

00280     public: bool isExecutionAcknowledge () const {
00281       return getRequestExecutionAcknowledge();
00282     }
00283 
00289     public: void setExecutionAcknowledge (bool set=true) {
00290       setRequestValidationAcknowledge(!set);
00291       setRequestExecutionAcknowledge(set);
00292     }

00295     public: bool getRequestQueryAcknowledge () const;

00299       return getRequestQueryAcknowledge();
00300     }

00302       setRequestQueryAcknowledge(set);
00303     }

00310       return getWarningsGenerated();

00362     // HELPERS
00363     protected: virtual int32_t getCtrlAckSettingsField () const {
00364       return VRTMath::unpackInt(bbuf, getHeaderLength());
00365     }
00366     protected: virtual bool getCtrlAckSettingsBit (int32_t bit) const {
00367       return ((getCtrlAckSettingsField() & bit) != 0);
00368     }
00369     protected: virtual void setCtrlAckSettingsBit (int32_t bit, bool set);
